Question: This person also called for the implementation of a guest worker program for immigrants, which was criticized by conservatives.
Hints: In May 2004, Gallup reported that 89% of the Republican electorate approved of this person.
This person used a budget surplus to push through Texas's largest tax-cut, $2 billion.
One of the most notable programs initiated by this person is the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief Program (PEPFAR).
